[{"id":1,"mes":[{"Name":"n1","Fee":63},{"Name":"n2","Fee":88}]},{"id":2,"mes":[{"Name":"m1","Fee":63}]}]

while the requested behavior is :
[{"id":1,"mes":2},{"id":2},"mes":1]

that's the reason for using MarshalJSON , to override the default 
Marshaller ....
